page.title: 10Home_life. town.
page.content: Several business people reside in substantial houses on the Garth Hill which is the very northernly edge of Knighton. As an example, a family of four,two adults and two children live in a three storey house of eleven rooms, with mains electricty,(no gas available) and central heating from a Rayburn stove. Family has two cars. Father appreiates Knighton's sports clubs. but would prefer to live in Ludlow were it not for his local business. Most of these small business people are conected with the building trade. Some work from their homes others have work shops in Knighton. One is connected with slaughtering of animals. At Gwernaffel lives the widow of a local landowner and benefactor. Estate now much reduced. House very pleasant
